fig.label: Figure 3.
fig.alt-text: Graphical representation of child stunting in 2030 under various scenarios, as 5th centile, mean, and 95th centile. Bar graph plots number of stunted children in the study countries in millions (y-axis) across the six scenarios (x-axis), with number of children stunted in each scenario shown by degree of stunting (moderate or severe) and by area (rural or urban).
